sections.name: Description
sections.html: These druids dwell in the most explosive spots in the world.

tactics.name: Before Combat
tactics.text: The druid casts shambler once per week and casts ironwood on his armor every 19 days.

tactics.name: During Combat
tactics.text: The druid sends shambling mounds into combat, casts mass cat’s grace, wild shapes into a Huge fire elemental, and moves in to flank.

combat_gear.name: scroll of mass cure serious wounds
